mapper.select: SELECT s.song_idx, s.play_mode, s.title, s.thumbnail_url, s.video_url, s.preview_music_url, m.motion_tag, s.difficulty, s.calorie_consumption FROM songList s LEFT JOIN motionType m ON s.motion_type_idx = m.motion_type_idx

SELECT m.motion_type_idx, s.song_idx, s.play_mode, s.title, s.thumbnail_url, s.video_url, s.preview_music_url, m.motion_tag, s.difficulty, s.calorie_consumption FROM songList s LEFT JOIN motionType m ON s.motion_type_idx = m.motion_type_idx WHERE m.motion_type_idx = #{motionTypeIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playRecord(child_idx, song_idx, play_mode) VALUES(#{childIdx}, #{songIdx}, #{playMode})

SELECT MAX(play_record_idx) FROM playRecord
INSERT INTO scoreRecord(play_record_idx, motion_type_idx, count, time, count_standard, score) VALUES(#{playRecordIdx}, #{danceIdx}, #{count}, #{time}, #{countStandard}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT experience_score FROM parent WHERE parent_idx = (SELECT parent_idx FROM children WHERE child_idx = #{childIdx});

SELECT m.motion_tag FROM motionType m INNER JOIN (SELECT s.motion_type_idx, SUM(s.score) AS score_sum FROM playRecord p RIGHT JOIN scoreRecord s ON p.play_record_idx = s.play_record_idx WHERE child_idx = #{childIdx} GROUP BY motion_type_idx ORDER BY score_sum LIMIT 1) AS t ON m.motion_type_idx = t.motion_type_idx
